subject: Add Phase 1.5 (Demo Cleanup) to implementation plan
body:
Document decision to remove NFTs and Web3 tabs from the demo UI,
keep wallet/transaction features, and restructure navigation for
the Koinz investment platform.

New navigation: Dashboard → Funds → Wallet → Transactions → Settings

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Add Phase 1.5 (Demo Cleanup) to implementation plan
